Clean and pat dry the fish steaks.
Marinate fish with ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chili powder, garam masala, lemon juice, and salt.
Let marinate for 30 min in refrigerator.
Heat oil in a pan over medium flame.
Shallow fry fish until golden brown and cooked through, ~8-10 min per side.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.
